name: HootBoard – Bulletin Board For Your Organization & Team Communication
author: HootBoard

sections.description: HootBoard is a beautiful bulletin board for your organization. Whether you are a workplace, university, government, or an organization there is now a better way to get members engaged, content organized & knowledge shared. Use a HootBoard to promote events, post classifieds, start discussions, share links, upload documents and more. Better yet, HootBoard seamlessly works across web, mobile, kiosks & your organization’s digital signage. That way you have one method to communicate with your entire audience. And with this WordPress plugin you can add a HootBoard to your website in under a minute. So let’s get started with our perpetual FREE plan for web & mobile access!

2.0

  • HootBoard has been updated with a brand new look.
  • Partnerships feature added to all you to connect and share events, information and more with other organizations in the area.
  • Collections feature added so you can organize all posts on your board so it can be found months later.
  • Sub-boards feature added so you can create boards for departments and sub groups within your organization.
  • This release also includes a number of fixes and improvements.
